rows.label: tlk45310111_04_msg0001
rows.name:
Apparently the Uzushio isn't going
to be setting sail any time soon.

rows.label: tlk45310111_04_msg0002
rows.name:
Normally I'd gather up a crew, take
this ship out to a distant quadrant
and try to haul up some big prize.

rows.label: tlk45310111_04_msg0003
rows.name:
But I guess it's not so
bad to go out salvaging on
my own once in a while.

rows.label: tlk45310111_04_msg0004
rows.name:
Takes me back to simpler days when I'd
go out, collect a bunch of treasures
and be thrilled at every G I earned!
